title: [Wizard Guild, North Lawn]
description: An ice-frosted hedge skirts the border of the guild walls as several small gardens full of herbs and roots surround a translucent ice block shelter.  The lawn is illuminated by stray beams of sunlight that pierce the cloud cover, reflect off the ice blocks, and dance upon the manicured grass.

An ice frosted hedge skirts the border of the guild walls as several small gardens full of herbs and roots surround a translucent ice block shelter.  The night air is crisp and the lawn is illuminated by small orbs filled with some kind of phosphorescent liquid.
